text: The women's 55 kg competition of the weightlifting events at the 2019 Pan American Games in Lima, Peru, was held on July 28 at the Coliseo Mariscal Caceres. ==Results== Nine athletes from nine countries took part. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" ! title: Weightlifting at the 2019 Pan American Games – Women's 55 kg
